title: Pattam Pole (2013) Malayalam DVDRip x264 AAC 5.1 E-Sub-[vtv]
description:
Plot

Karthi (Dulquer Salman) and Riya (Malavika Mohanan) elope one early morning to Ooty, fearing that the elders in the family will not accept their inter-religious relationship. They return to their respective homes after a couple of days after having a fight. They convince their loved ones that they hate each other and vow never to see each other again. The film would then trace the eventual course of their lives.


Pattam Pole (English: Like a Kite) is a 2013 Malayalam romantic film scripted by Girish Kumar, directed by renowned cinematographer Alagappan, who makes his directorial debut, and produced by Karunakaran under the banner of Carlton Films. The film tracks the relationship between a Brahmin youth, Karthik, and a Christian girl, Riya. Dulquer Salmaan plays the role of Karthik and new face Malavika Mohan, daughter of Bollywood cinematographer K. U. Mohanan, appears as Riya. Archana Kavi, Anoop Menon, Lalu Alex, Jayaprakash, Seetha, Leema Babu, Shraddha Gokul, Nandhu and Ilavarasu play supporting roles.[1] The film commenced its production in June 2013 and was mainly shot from Alappuzha in Kerala and Kumbakonam in Tamil Nadu.

Cast

    Dulquer Salmaan as Karthik
    Malavika Mohanan as Riya
    Archana Kavi as Sherin
    Anoop Menon as Michael Rossario
    Jayaprakash as Ramanathan, Karthik's father
    Lalu Alex as Mathews, Riya's father
    Meera Krishna as Karthik's mother
    Seetha as Sussan Mathews, Riya's mother
    Leema Babu as Varalakshmi, Karthik's cousin
    Shraddha Gokul as Rita, Riya's sister
    Kannan Nayar as Ronex, Sherin's fiancee
    Nandhu as Father Alex
    Ilavarasu as Karthik's uncle
    Ziyam Hasbi as Rinu
